category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: REQ_Export_WithAddin
preference.preference_description: Activates the traditional "Edit in Word", "Export to Excel" and "Export to Word" in Active Workspace(using Addins). Ensures that each HTML requirement is converted to Word in background. Valid values are: true : User should be able to use all traditional features like "Edit in Word", "Export to Excel" and "Export to Word". false: User will not be able to use any of the above features and the commands itself will be disabled. This is the default value.
